platform.util

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.util.Transform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input, Output
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    View

    public abstract class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
implements Input, Output
    Applies a simple coordinate transform.
